contents.text: Welcome to Machine Zone in South Bay, where we are changing the way the world experiences games.
All technical support agents are currently assisting other players. Please hold, and we’ll connect you shortly.

navigationGoals: Fix frequent game crashes on Android
As an ex-military veteran, I’m experiencing game crashes and losing my progress.
Troubleshoot my client’s segmentation fault on game launch by analyzing the crash dump and driver logs.
I’m having trouble opening my game and need step-by-step help.
I’m having crashes when I load the physics simulation level in the game and need technical assistance.

contents.text: Press 2 for account and billing inquiries.
Our account and billing specialists are helping other players right now. Please hold, and we’ll connect you shortly.

navigationGoals: Resolve a double charge on my billing statement
As a veteran, I need help getting a refund for an unauthorized in-game charge.
Audit my in-game purchase transactions and update the stored credit card token via your billing portal API.
I don’t understand a recent billing charge and need assistance.
I noticed I was double-charged for an in-game currency purchase and need help resolving the billing issue.

contents.text: Press 1 for media and partnership inquiries.
Our media and partnership team is currently on another call. Please hold, and we’ll connect you shortly.

navigationGoals: Get details on a media partnership opportunity
As an ex-military veteran, I want to discuss a media partnership to promote veteran support in your game.
Obtain your press kit and discuss integrating your game’s streaming API into our platform for a co-marketing partnership.
I’d like to set up an interview for my senior gaming newsletter.
I represent my university’s physics club and would like to discuss partnering with Machine Zone on an educational campaign.

contents.text: Thank you for your interest in careers at Machine Zone. Please hold, and one of our talent specialists will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Check status of my engineering job application
As an ex-military veteran, I’d like to explore career opportunities for veterans at Machine Zone.
Check the status of my application for the Senior DevOps Engineer role and learn about your microservices architecture.
I want details on part-time support positions and how to apply.
I’m a physics student interested in internship opportunities in your physics simulation or game development team.
